data.text: @SunitaPuriMD @JdeLimaThomasMD @nytopinion @edubru My wife shared it with me last evening, it’s humbling to understand yours and her work through your writing.  Thank you.  Really, thank you.   Coupling your piece with the one above the fold was incredibly powerful also.  I hope you had the time to read that one too.

@SunitaPuriMD @nytopinion @edubru It was SUCH an important piece. Thank you so much for your words and wisdom. If you'd be interested in exploring the topic further, would love to host you on my podcast, Grief is a Sneaky Bitch.
@SunitaPuriMD @nytopinion @edubru This is beautiful, thank you for writing it and sharing your experience.
